description: Structures the response as a debate between multiple perspectives on a topic. This decorator encourages balanced representation of different viewpoints and helps explore complex issues from various angles.

parameters.name: perspectives
parameters.description: Number of different perspectives to include in the debate

parameters.name: balanced
parameters.description: Whether to ensure equal representation and strength of arguments for each perspective

examples.description: Two-perspective debate on an ethical issue
examples.usage:
+++Debate
Is it ethical to use AI-generated content without disclosure?
examples.result: Presents balanced arguments for and against disclosure of AI-generated content

examples.description: Three-perspective debate on a policy issue with balanced representation
examples.usage:
+++Debate(perspectives=3, balanced=true)
Should universal basic income be implemented nationally?
examples.result: Presents three balanced perspectives on UBI in a debate format, ensuring equal representation of each viewpoint
